content:
A gourmet gift basket pairs perfectly with some fun and functional stocking stuffers. Here are some ideas to complement your gift basket:

1. **Gourmet Food Items**:
	* Specialty teas or coffee (~$5-10)
	* Artisanal cheese crackers or biscuits (~$5-10)
	* Chocolate truffles or gourmet nuts (~$5-10)
	* Infused oils or spices (~$5-10)
2. **Wine and Bar Accessories**:
	* Wine charms or bottle stoppers (~$5-10)
	* Cocktail mixers or bitters (~$5-10)
	* Bar-themed coasters or napkins (~$5-10)
	* Wine-infused goodies like wine-soaked cheese or wine-glazed nuts (~$10-20)
3. **Pampering Essentials**:
	* Luxurious soaps or lotions (~$5-10)
	* scented candles or room sprays (~$10-20)
	* Cozy throw blankets or plush socks (~$10-20)
	* Travel-sized pampering sets (~$10-20)
4. **Fun and Games**:
	* Wine-themed playing cards or coasters (~$5-10)
	* A deck of cards or a small puzzle (~$5-10)
	* A fun keychain or magnet (~$5-10)
	* A gift card to a local experience or activity (~$10-20)
5. **Tech and Accessories**:
	* Phone cases or screen protectors (~$10-20)
	* Portable phone chargers or earbuds (~$10-20)
	* A small power bank or wireless charging pad (~$10-20)
	* A set of nice notecards or stationery (~$5-10)

Remember, these are just ideas to get you started. You can choose items that fit your siblings-in-law's interests and personalities. The goal is to add a few fun and functional items to complement the gourmet gift basket.

Since you already have some fun socks and candies for your nieces and nephews, you can consider adding a few more items to their stockings, such as:

* Small toys or trinkets (~$5-10)
* Stickers or coloring books (~$5-10)
* A special treat, like gourmet popcorn or cookies (~$5-10)
* A gift card to their favorite store or online retailer (~$10-20)

Feel free to mix and match these ideas or add your own personal touch to make the gifts extra special!
